titleStmt.title: A pleasant new ballad of Tobias wherin is shewed: the wonderfull things which chanced to him in his youth; and how he wedded a young damsell that had had seven husbands and never enjoyed their company: who were all slaine by a wicked spirit.

publicationStmt.publisher: for F. Coules dwelling in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: In two parts; woodcut illustrations at head of each part.
Reproductions of original in the British Library.
